name: Carmignac Gestion SA
goal: Carmignac is an independent asset management firm established in 1989 operating from 8 different offices.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
all initiatives related to:
- Asset management (UCITS, AIFM, etc.)
- AML
- Financial markets (MIFID, etc.)
- Corporate governance
- Benchmark
- Market abuse
- PRIIPs
- Solvency 2
- GDPR
- etc.
